choices.content: ![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 0) and (6, 1).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/d3fe0d3c25e57958706229ac278cfba8bd4e187b)

![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 0) and (6, 1).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/2abd08af527281f2aba8de4f4cc3079bb40949b0)

![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 0) and (1, 6).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/0ae1da54800f0a6bc83b2f181a3b00cf9538c5b4)

![A coordinate plane with two lines. The x- and y-axes both scale by two. The line labeled f passes through the points (0, 0) and (2, 2). The line labeled g passes through the points (0, 0) and (1, 6).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/22100023b0d9ef863a2e1abaa4e11b8152e6862d)
